title: President meets Siraj ul Haq to condole his motherâ€™s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 19 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Thursday met Amir of Jamat-e-Islami Sirajul Haq here to express condolence over the death of his mother.
The president offered Fateha and prayed for peace of the departed soul, said a news release.
Sympathizing with the bereaved family, he also prayed for strength to them to bear the loss with fortitude.
